page.title: 16A DAY IN THE LIFE OF DAVID
page.content: I wake up around 8.15. I get out of bed and go downstairs to get breakfast which is cornflakes.Then Mum comes downstairs.I watch Saturday Superstore and T.V A.M. By then it is 10.15. I put my Spectrum computer on and decide to put the "Space Invaders" game on. Afternoon shopping in Southampton is very busy and noisy.We go into Debenhams to look around. We have chips and hamburgers in Mac Donalds. we carry on up to Tyrrel and Greens (a departmental store) where I buy a Computer game and Mum buys some kitchen utensils. We come home around 6.00 pm and watch T.V. We have tea around 6.30 pm which is boiled egg and at 9.30 we go bed.
